refnamediv.refpurpose: Evaluate a generic Python expression and store the result in a Csound variable at k-time or i-time (i suffix).

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in py. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
These opcodes evaluate a generic Python expression and store the result in a Csound variable at k-time or i-time (i suffix).
The expression must evaluate in a float or an object that can be cast to a float.
They can be used effectively to trasfer data from a Python object into a Csound variable.

refsect1.title: Example of the pyeval Opcode Group
refsect1.para: will copy the content of the Python variable v1 into the Csound variable k1 at each k-time.
